item.title: Learning Temporary Block-Based Bidirectional Incongruity-Aware Correlation Filters for Efficient UAV Object Tracking
item.description:

@article{Lin2020TCSVT,
				title={{Learning Temporary Block-Based Bidirectional Incongruity-Aware Correlation Filters for Efficient UAV Object Tracking}},

item.title: BiCF: Learning Bidirectional Incongruity-Aware Correlation Filter for Efficient UAV Object Tracking
item.description:
Comparison between discriminative correlation filter (DCF) and the proposed BiCF
